translations: 抛弃，离开（尤指不履行责任)；摒弃，离开（尤指喜爱的事物）；离开，告别（某地）

sentences.sentence: I still love him and I would never forsake him.
sentences.translation: 我仍然爱他，我永远不会离弃他。

sentences.sentence: He had made it clear to his wife that he would never forsake her.
sentences.translation: 他明确地向妻子说，永远不离开她。

sentences.sentence: You must forsake your bad habits.
sentences.translation: 你必须革除你的坏习惯。
